name: AllstateGoodHacks
0:
”Alexa, open Good Hacks”
”Alexa, ask Good Hacks for cleaning hacks”
”Alexa, ask Good Hacks how to clean a glass cooktop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good hacks
des:
Ask Allstate Good Hacks how to tackle tasks around the house. From removing tough stains to killing bugs, Good Hacks gives you step-by-step guidance. 

You can start by asking Alexa to find hacks by category. For example, say “Alexa, tell me about hacks for cleaning.” You can also ask about hacks for other categories, including safety, maintenance and lifestyle. 

Want to hear the most popular or newest hack? Just say “Alexa, tell me the most popular hack” or “Alexa, tell me what’s new.” 

Navigate through each hack by saying “Alexa, play overview” or “Play step one.” You can also say things like “Alexa, go back,” or “Alexa, skip this step.” 

Once you’ve enabled the skill, you can say things like: 
Alexa, ask Good Hacks how do I clean a glass cook top?
Alexa, ask Good Hacks how do I open a jar with duct tape? 
Alexa, ask Good Hacks how to freshen any room.

To get started, just enable the skill and start talking. 

We’re always learning and building new hacks. Please leave us a review and let us know which hacks you enjoy and any you’d like to see added.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
